attributes.action: Make eBay provide FULL contact details and support for all users
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Users of ebay will not know until they need to contact eBay.  That eBay favours the "eBay Power Sellers" (ie the sellers who sell alot of items on ebay) they get full phone and email support.

Normal/Regular users of eBay do not get this "priority" support.

This should not be allowed to happen eBay as a business should be FORCED to show their contact details easily via the eBay home page and a link at the bottom of each page (not a 10 link contact form but full support via easy to access email and via phone).
